query:
UPDATE
                    company 
                SET
                    name = COALESCE($1, name),
                    description = COALESCE($2, description),
                    phone = COALESCE($3, phone),
                    email = COALESCE($4, email),
                    avatar_url = COALESCE($5, avatar_url),
                    website = COALESCE($6, website),
                    crn = COALESCE($7, crn),
                    vatin = COALESCE($8, vatin),
                    edited_at = NOW()
                WHERE
                    id = $9;
